#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

#define     s(n)                scanf("%d",&n)
#define     ss(n)               scanf("%s",n)
#define     sc(n)               scanf("%c",&n)
#define     sll(n)              scanf("%lld",&n)
#define     fall(i,a,b)         for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define     max(a,b)		    ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define     min(a,b)		    ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define	    ll			        long long

int main()
{
    int t;
    s(t);
    string st;
    while(t--)
    {
        int sum=0,i;
        cin>>st;
        for(i=0;i<st.size();i++)
            sum+=st[i];
        printf("%c\n",(sum/i));
    }
return 0;
}
